name: Mánagarmr
description:
In the snowfield, a Wolfmother is finding and bringing her mischievous children back to the cave to prepare for hibernation. 

Goal: 

The Wolfmother needs to find her 5 wolfcub in order and bring them back to the cave. 
However, in this cruel winter, the wolf mother needs to keep in mind her stamina in order to carry all the children. 
Consume food and Carry all the children back! 
The game environment used procedure generation with 2.5D hand-drawn texture. 

With our composed bgm, we would like to bring you an immersive lost and warm adventure.

https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/wolfmother-2
